# converter

**Instance Property**

A structure used to convert locations to and from coordinate spaces in the hierarchy of the associated SwiftUI view.

## Declaration

```swift
let converter: NSGestureRecognizerRepresentableCoordinateSpaceConverter
```
title: converter
